description.raw:
Currently the default branch Ubuntu builds of ign-gui are broken:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gui-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=14)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-bionic-amd64/14/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-bionic-amd64/14/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64&build=96)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64/96/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64/96/

This branch builds ign-rendering0 from source for ign-gui0 docker builds and explicitly sets the rendering major version to 0 to fix gui default xenial build. This fixes the builds:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gui-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=15)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-bionic-amd64/15/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-bionic-amd64/15/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64&build=98)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64/98/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64/98/

This branch builds ign-rendering0 from source for ign-gui0 docker builds and explicitly sets the rendering major version to 0 to fix gui default xenial build. This fixes the builds:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-bionic-amd64/15/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64/98/

title: Fix ign-gui default branch builds
